unittitle_ssm: Hemispheric Institute Digital Video Library Archived Website
abstract_ssm: The Hemispheric Institute Digital Video Library, established in 2005, is a partnership with NYU Libraries to preserve and provide access to the digital library of the Hemispheric Institute. The library is made up of video of political performance practices in the Americas dating back to the 1970s.
